alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:00PM EST until January 08 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Onondaga and Madison counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northwest winds of 10 to 20 mph could cause blowing snow Friday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
